name: guanajuatobot
description: Bot officiel du serveur RP FH5 GuanajuatoRo

scripts.docker:major: cls && npx auto-version --major && npm run build && docker build -t dercraker0/guanajuato-bot:latest . && docker push dercraker0/guanajuato-bot:latest
scripts.docker: cls && npx auto-version --minor && npm run build && docker build -t dercraker0/guanajuato-bot:latest . && docker push dercraker0/guanajuato-bot:latest
scripts.docker:fix: cls && npx auto-version --patch && npm run build && docker build -t dercraker0/guanajuato-bot:latest . && docker push dercraker0/guanajuato-bot:latest
scripts.dev: nodemon -e js,ts --watch src --exec "cls && npm run build && npm run start"

author: Dercraker
